text: Sing It Loud is the thirteenth studio album by k.d. lang and was released on . It is her first collection of original material since 2008's Watershed. ==Track listing== All songs written by k.d. lang and Joe Pisapia unless otherwise noted. #"I Confess" (lang, Daniel Clarke, Joshua Grange) – 4:25 #"A Sleep with No Dreaming" – 3:31 #"The Water's Edge" – 3:53 #"Perfect Word" – 4:41 #"Sugar Buzz" – 5:14 #"Sing It Loud" (Pisapia) – 5:25 #"Inglewood" – 3:30 #"Habit of Mind" (lang, Clarke, Grange) – 4:13 #"Heaven" (David Byrne, Jerry Harrison) – 4:10 #"Sorrow Nevermore" (lang, Clarke, Grange) – 3:33 14-track version exclusive to kdlang.com includes: 11. "Reminiscing" (Graeham Goble) – 3:45 12. "I Am the Winner" – 2:26 13. "Hollywood Kids" – 3:53 14.
